title: TerraTech v0.4.4
description:
Early Access Release Notes - Version 0.4.4

New features / content / improvements:

    Can now grab resources.
    Complete overhaul of resource types and crafting recipes.
    New 'Alloy' system for combining refined resources.
    All GSO blocks can now be crafted (including crafting blocks).
    Scrapper Block added to Main Game.
    New warning messages added.
    Blocks flash green when healing.
    Added a toggle for inverting reverse controls.
    Updated Russian translation text.
    Game Design Tweaks:
        Pushed the initial waves distance back further.
        Added more enemy Techs.
        Tweaked the values of all blocks.
        Reduced the pickup range of the receivers.
        More UI overlay tweaks. 
    R&D Pack:
        Added new example bases for Solar Gen and Scrapper.
        Added dispensers for Solar Gen and Scrapper.
        Added a smoker rock (for radius).
        Added a Remote Charger.
        Added the 2 slot refinery
